name: Check WS Message
Get Device Information
Listen /ws/index
info:
receive id='init' to virify type
send id = 'init_btn' to change button active by type
receive id='change_type' to get devices of type
get devices of type
send id = 'change_type' to change button active by type
     and change table data by devices of type
